column4: Microsoft to offer cloud services from Germany
column5: Microsoft Corp plans to open data centers in Germany in partnership with Deutsche Telekom AG  offering cloud storage to European businesses keen to safeguard their data from U.S. surveillance.

column4: UPDATE 2-Microsoft to offer cloud services from Germany
column5: * Services to be available in 32 countries in H2 2016   (Adds details  analyst comment)

column4: Microsoft to offer cloud services from Germany
column5: Nov 11 Microsoft Corp said on Wednesday it was opening data centers in Germany  partnering with Deutsche Telekom AG  to offer European users cloud data storage.

column4: Cisco  Ericsson reveal bigger ambitions for revenues in new partnership
column5: BARCELONA The $1 billion in added revenue Cisco  and Ericsson  each expect to see by 2018 from their new partnership to build next-generation networks is just the beginning  top executives said on Wednesday.

column4: UPDATE 1-Cisco  Ericsson reveal bigger ambitions for revenues in new partnership
column5: BARCELONA  Nov 11 The $1 billion in added revenue Cisco and Ericsson each expect to see by 2018 from their new partnership to build next-generation networks is just the beginning  top executives said on Wednesday.

column4: Cisco  Ericsson reveal bigger ambitions for revenues in new partnership
column5: BARCELONA  Nov 11 The $1 billion in added revenue Cisco and Ericsson each expect to see by 2018 from their new partnership to build next-generation networks announced this week is just a start for sales growth  top executives said on Wednesday.
